text: John Paul Henson (April 25, 1965 â€” February 14, 2014) was an American puppeteer. He was born in Greenwich, Connecticut. He was a performer of The Muppets. Puppeteers Jim and Jane Henson were his parents. Henson died on Valentine's Day 2014, aged 48, after having a heart attack. == Other websites == * Category:1965 births Category:2014 deaths Category:American puppeteers Category:American voice actors Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Muppets
title: John Henson
